submission:
# @param {Integer[][]} board
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_value_sum(board)
    arr = []
    y = 0
    x = 0
    while y < board.length
        x = 0
        while x < board[0].length
            arr[y*board[0].length + x] = [board[y][x], y, x]
            x += 1
        end
        y += 1
    end
    arr = arr.sort_by!{|x| 0 - x[0]}
    max = (- (10 ** 9) - 1 ) * 3
    i = 0
    while i < arr.length - 2
        j = i + 1
        while j < arr.length - 1
                       if arr[i][1] == arr[j][1] || arr[i][2] == arr[j][2]
                j += 1
                next
            end
            k = j + 1
            while k < arr.length
                if arr[i][1] != arr[k][1] && arr[i][2] != arr[k][2] && arr[j][1] != arr[k][1] && arr[j][2] != arr[k][2]
                    max = arr[i][0] + arr[j][0] + arr[k][0] if arr[i][0] + arr[j][0] + arr[k][0] > max
                    break
                end
                k += 1
            end
            j += 1
        end
        i += 1
        return max if arr[i][0] + arr[i+1][0] + arr[i+2][0] <= max
    end
    max
end
